result.title: Can I search for solutions in a particular language on the standings page?
result.content:
Hi, I'm looking for Python submissions on codeforces. I'm clicking through the standings page of a recent contest and most seem to be C or C++. Can I sort / filter the submissions by language somehow or is there a color coding that I don't understand yet?

Best, Esuhi

PS: What's the best way to ask questions like this one?
